attributes.action: Give Gina Miller a knighthood for restoring parliamentary sovereignty.
attributes.background: Gina Miller bravely defied the death threats and abuse from the public and stood up and won back parliamentry sovereignty in our courts. She sould be duly honoured with a knighthood to show our appreciation for this great lady.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
